analyzed: sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha eka

original: Akusalaṁ kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo kilesasampayutto ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: akusalam kilesa sampayuttam ca iva no ca kilesam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ kilesa sampayuttaḥ ca iva no ca kilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyāḥ ekam pe avigate eka

original: (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha eka

original: 4.6.8. Kusalattika, Kilesavippayuttasaṅkilesikaduka
Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Kusalaṁ kilesavippayuttaṁ saṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko
analyzed: kusalam kilesa vippayuttam saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ kilesa vippayuttaḥ saṅkilesikaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ kilesavippayuttaṁ saṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam kilesa vippayuttam saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca

original: abyākato kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ kilesavippayuttaṁ
analyzed: abyākataḥ kilesa vippayuttaḥ saṅkilesikaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam kilesa vippayutta

original: saṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko ca abyākato kilesavippayutto
analyzed: saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ kilesa vippayutto saṅkilesikaḥ ca abyākataḥ kilesa vippayutto

original: saṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: saṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Abyākataṁ kilesavippayuttaṁ saṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: abyākatam kilesa vippayuttam saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ kilesa vippayuttaḥ saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Kusalaṁ kilesavippayuttaṁ saṅkilesikañca abyākataṁ kilesavippayuttaṁ saṅkilesikañca
analyzed: kusalam kilesa vippayuttam saṅkilesikam ca abyākatam kilesa vippayuttam saṅkilesikam ca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ kilesa vippayuttaḥ saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Kusalo kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo kusalassa kilesavippayuttassa saṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: kusalaḥ kilesa vippayuttaḥ saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ kusalassa kilesa vippayuttassa saṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Abyākato kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa kilesavippayuttassa saṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākataḥ kilesa vippayuttaḥ saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa kilesa vippayuttassa saṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri …pe… avigate satta.
analyzed: hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe cattāri adhipatiyā cattāri pe avigate satta

original: Kusalaṁ kilesavippayuttaṁ asaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalam kilesa vippayuttam asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ kilesa vippayuttaḥ asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Abyākataṁ kilesavippayuttaṁ asaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: abyākatam kilesa vippayuttam asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ kilesa vippayuttaḥ asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā dve …pe… āsevane vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā dve pe āsevane vipāke ekam pe avigate dve

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Kusalo kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko dhammo kusalassa kilesavippayuttassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: kusalaḥ kilesa vippayuttaḥ asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ kusalassa kilesa vippayuttassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Abyākato kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa kilesavippayuttassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākataḥ kilesa vippayuttaḥ asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa kilesa vippayuttassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve …pe… upanissaye cattāri …pe… kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā dve ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā tīṇi anantare dve pe upanissaye cattāri pe kamme tīṇi vipāke ekam pe avigate dve saṅkhitta

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṁ, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala attike pañhāvāraḥ evam

original: Kusalattikakilesagocchakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: kusalattika kilesa gocchakam
